item.title: Lossless Scaling Configuration for Emulators
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
Lossless Scaling Configuration for Emulators

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

Maximize your FPS on emulators with Lossless Scaling. Detailed configuration guide for Switch, PS2, PS3 with frame generation and upscaling.

Published on 2025-10-07 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-10-07

item.title: Installation and Configuration of Eden
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
Installation and Configuration of Eden

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

Learn how to install and configure Eden (Yuzu fork) for optimal Nintendo Switch emulation. Complete guide with firmware, keys, and optimizations.

Published on 2025-06-02 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-06-07

item.title: How to Use Amiibo on Switch Emulators (Yuzu & Ryujinx)

Learn to use virtual amiibo on Yuzu and Ryujinx emulators. Step-by-step guide with file download and complete configuration.

item.title: How to Reinstall Yuzu & Ryujinx While Keeping Your Save Files
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
How to Reinstall Yuzu & Ryujinx While Keeping Your Save Files

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

Learn how to completely reinstall Yuzu and Ryujinx without losing your precious save files. Detailed guide with screenshots and backup methods.
